data.eml:eml: Generic redefinition, key and two new species of Acorystus To w ne s (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Cryptinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Scherrer, Marcus V., Santos, Bernardo F., Aguiar, Alexandre P. (2010): Generic redefinition, key and two new species of Acorystus To w ne s (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Cryptinae). Zootaxa 2721: 28-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.199900
